channel.title: Blogs on chungman.kim
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on chungman.kim

item.title: Serving Assets to My Website Part 1
item.description: Serving assets, such as images and documents, to be accessible to end users is essential to a modern web experience. As for what I have in mind with this blog, I want to visually capture steps that I took to help jog my memory of what I did or learned. Setting this up took me 30 minutes the first time. The steps are split into a series of posts to keep the posts short and organized.

item.title: Finding Purpose for Blogging
item.description: update I’ve taken my focus away from blogging to dedicate my time and energy on other efforts. Since my last post, a few noteworthy happenings came about. I switched jobs from Realogy (formerly known as ZapLabs) to Duetto, got my second AWS Certification, and heavily invested into learning Dart & Flutter to name a few. As exciting as each moment was, retaining and recalling everything that I’ve learned has been challenging.

item.title: Start
item.description: At this point, I’ve probably drafted and redrafted my first post more times than my hands and toes can count. Who knew that starting a blog could be both an exciting and uncomfortable experience? With that said, I’m looking forward to seeing what would become of this new endeavor. This introduction is for me and all those who are new to blogging. Good luck.
